# Econometric estimation

```{r}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, tidymodels, gravity, here, panelr, plm, nlme)
gravity <- read_csv("gravity.csv")
```

#### Params

```{r}
exports <- panel_data(gravity %>% filter(exports > 0), id = iso_j, wave = year)
imports <- panel_data(gravity %>% filter(imports > 0), id = iso_j, wave = year)
```

```{r}
formula_exports <- 
  log(exports) ~ log(tgdp) + rfe + sim + log(dist) + log(rer) + cont + lang + rta

formula_imports <- 
  log(imports) ~ log(tgdp) + rfe + sim + log(dist) + log(rer) + cont + lang + rta
```

#### Random effects estimator

```{r}
exports_ree <- 
  plm(formula_exports,
      data = exports,
      model = "random")

exports_ree_tidy <- exports_ree |> tidy()
exports_ree_glance <- exports_ree |> glance()

exports_ree |> summary()
```

```{r}
imports_ree <- 
  plm(formula_imports,
      data = imports,
      model = "random")

imports_ree_tidy <- imports_ree |> tidy()
imports_ree_glance <- imports_ree |> glance()

imports_ree |> summary()
```

#### Fixed effects estimator

```{r}
exports_fee <- 
  plm(formula_exports,
      data = exports,
      model = "within")

exports_fee_tidy <- exports_fee |> tidy()
exports_fee_glance <- exports_fee |> glance()

exports_fee |> summary()
```

```{r}
imports_fee <- 
  plm(formula_imports,
      data = imports,
      model = "within")

imports_fee_tidy <- imports_fee |> tidy()
imports_fee_glance <- imports_fee |> glance()

imports_fee |> summary()
```

#### AR(1) estimator

```{r}
exports_ar <- 
  lme(formula_exports,
      data = exports,
      random = ~1|iso_j,
      correlation = corAR1(0, form = ~year|iso_j))

exports_ar |> summary()
```

```{r}
imports_ar <- 
  lme(formula_imports,
      data = imports,
      random = ~1|iso_j,
      correlation = corAR1(0, form = ~year|iso_j))

imports_ar |> summary()
```

#### Poisson pseudo maximum likelihood estimator

```{r}
exports_features <- 
  exports |> 
  mutate(exports = log(exports),
         tgdp = log(tgdp),
         dist = log(dist),
         rer = log(rer)) |> 
  filter(exports >= 0 | tgdp >= 0 | dist >= 0 | rer >= 0)

exports_ppml <- 
  glm(formula_exports,
      family = quasipoisson(link = "log"),
      data = exports_features)

robust_coefficients <- lmtest::coeftest(exports_ppml, 
                                        vcov = sandwich::vcovHC(exports_ppml, 
                                                                type = "HC1"))

exports_ppml$coefficients <- 
  robust_coefficients[1:length(rownames(robust_coefficients))]

exports_ppml |> summary()
```

```{r}
imports_features <- 
  imports |> 
  mutate(imports = log(imports),
         tgdp = log(tgdp),
         dist = log(dist),
         rer = log(rer)) |> 
  filter(imports >= 0 | tgdp >= 0 | dist >= 0 | rer >= 0)

imports_ppml <- 
  glm(formula_imports,
      family = quasipoisson(link = "log"),
      data = imports_features)

robust_coefficients <- lmtest::coeftest(imports_ppml, 
                                        vcov = sandwich::vcovHC(imports_ppml, 
                                                                type = "HC1"))

imports_ppml$coefficients <- 
  robust_coefficients[1:length(rownames(robust_coefficients))]

imports_ppml |> summary()
```

#### Poisson pseudo maximum likelihood with fixed effects estimator

```{r}
formula_exports_fixed <- 
  log(exports) ~ log(tgdp) + rfe + sim + log(dist) + 
  log(rer) + cont + lang + rta + factor(year)

formula_imports_fixed <- 
  log(imports) ~ log(tgdp) + rfe + sim + log(dist) + 
  log(rer) + cont + lang + rta + factor(year)
```

```{r}
exports_ppml_fixed <- 
  glm(formula_exports_fixed,
      family = quasipoisson(link = "log"),
      data = exports_features)

exports_ppml_fixed |> summary()
```

```{r}
imports_ppml_fixed <- 
  glm(formula_imports_fixed,
      family = quasipoisson(link = "log"),
      data = imports_features)

imports_ppml_fixed |> summary()
```
